descriptionHtml:
I used [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11954]dualsun\'s new idle animation type 4[/url] to replace most of the movement and casting animations for magic, both single and dual wield. Now you will hover while you have a spell readied and when you cast it. I know the animation may look a little bit stiff, but I plan on learning how to animate so that i can make it look better.

This was made using Dualsun\'s animation so the animations are his property, he has given me permission to post this.
author: saker277
